title: It’s The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year: Nashville Originals Discount Gift Certificates
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Hit the sack early tonight so you’ll be wide awake tomorrow morning for the next quarterly Nashville Originals Discount Gift Certificate Sale! They will sell out within minutes, although a specific time is never released for the beginning of the sale. Last quarter, they went on sale around 6:45am.

If you’re not familiar with Nashville Originals, check out their site for a list of all the participating restaurants. You can snag $20 gift certificates for $12, $25 gift certificates for $16 and $50 gift certificates for $35 during these discount sales. With the holidays coming up, it’s the perfect gift for pretty much any Nashvillian on your list. We’ll notify you on our Twitter account when the sale opens, but you’ll still have to be awake to find out. Early bird gets the worm!
